subject: Truths to live by
verse: The fool says in his heart, "There is no God." They are corrupt, their deeds are vile; there is no one who does good. (Psalm 14:1)
reflection: The true atheist is either foolish or wicked ~ foolish because he ignores that God exists ~ or wicked because he refuses to live by God's truths. The truth of the matter is we all become atheists in practice when we rely more on ourselves than on God. ~ The fool mentioned here is someone who is aggressively perverse in his actions. To speak in direct defiance of God is utterly foolish according to the Bible.
prayer: Dear Lord Jesus, when we despair because of the world's increasing hostility or indifference to you, help us also to see the greatness of your love and grace. Amen.
original_content:
04/03?2011~~~food for thought~~~LET US NOT OVER-ESTIMATE OUR GOODNESS

Today's Verse:
The fool says in his heart, "There is no God." They are corrupt, 
their deeds are vile; there is no one who does good." - Psalm 14:1 

Today's Lesson:
The true atheist is either foolish or wicked ~ foolish because he 
ignores that God exists ~ or wicked because he refuses to live by 
God's truths. .

The truth of the matter is we all become atheists in practice when we
rely more on ourselves than on God. ~ The fool mentioned here is
someone who is aggressively perverse in his actions. .

To speak in direct defiance of God is utterly foolish according to
the Bible. .

Prayer Suggestion:
Dear Lord Jesus, when we despair because of the world's increasing
hostility or indifference to You, help us also to see the greatness of 
Your love and grace. Amen.

Pastor Alvin & Marcie Sather

The Lord said, "I am the way, the truth, and the life. 
No one can come to the Father except through Me." ~ John: 14:6

subject: THE ADVANTAGE OF HAVING WISE COUNSEL
verse: A wise man is mightier than a strong man, and a man  of knowledge is more powerful than a strong man. So  don’t go to war without wise guidance; victory depends on having many counselors. (Proverbs 24:5-6)
reflection:
In any major decision we make, it is not a sign of weak-
ness to ask for advice. Instead, it is foolish not to ask
for it. Find good advisers before making any big decis-
ions.
They can help you expand your alternatives and evaluate your choices.
prayer: Dear Lord, I pray that I will always find wise counsel. The reason being is I cannot keep up with today’s technology. So I pray help me out. Amen.
original_content:
message_id: 17c42cbd82165652
subject   : Subject: THE ADVANTAGE OF HAVING WISE COUNSEL
from      : Pastor Sather <pastor.sather5@gmail.com>
to        : undisclosed-recipients:;
date      : Sat, 2 Oct 2021 15:57:08 -0500
===================================================================
Body (clean, unformatted):
===================================================================
*Today’s Verses:*

*A wise man is mightier than a strong man, and a man *

*of knowledge is more powerful than a strong man. So *

*don’t go to war without wise guidance; victory depends*

* on having many counselors. *(Pro. 24:5-6)



*Today’s Reflection:*

In any major decision we make, it is not a sign of weak-

ness to ask for advice. Instead, it is foolish not to ask

for it. Find good advisers before making any big decis-

ions. They can help you expand your alternatives and

evaluate your choices.

*Pastor Sather*

*Dear Lord, I pray that I will always find wise counsel. *

*The reason being is I cannot keep up with today’s technology. *

*So I pray help me out. **Amen. *
